name: Sales Invoice Data
query:
SELECT
    si.name AS "Invoice#:Link/Sales Invoice:200",
    si.posting_date AS "Invoice Date:Date:200",
    si.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:200",
    si.status AS "Status:Data:200",
    si.customer AS "Customer Name:Link/Customer:200",
    si.po_no AS "Customer PO:Data:200",
    si.grand_total AS "Invoice Total:Currency:200",
    si.outstanding_amount AS "Invoice Outstanding:Currency:200",

    -- Credit Note Amount (Always Positive)
    ABS(IFNULL((
        SELECT SUM(cn.grand_total)
        FROM `tabSales Invoice` cn
        WHERE
            cn.docstatus = 1
            AND cn.name LIKE 'CN%%'
            AND cn.return_against = si.name
    ), 0)) AS "Credit Note Amount:Currency:200",

    -- Final Outstanding = Outstanding Amount - Credit Note Amount
    (
        si.outstanding_amount 
        - ABS(IFNULL((
            SELECT SUM(cn.grand_total)
            FROM `tabSales Invoice` cn
            WHERE
                cn.docstatus = 1
                AND cn.name LIKE 'CN%%'
                AND cn.return_against = si.name
        ), 0))
    ) AS "Final Outstanding:Currency:200",

    si.custom_invoice_mode AS "Invoice Mode:Data:200",
    si.custom_start_date AS "Invoice Start Date:Date:200",
    si.custom_end_date AS "Invoice End Date:Date:200"

FROM
    `tabSales Invoice` si
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1
    AND si.name NOT LIKE 'CN%%'
